title: Trevor Interviews Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms About Georgia's Reopening
itunes:title: Trevor Interviews Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms About Georgia's Reopening
description:
President Trump suggests injected disinfectants can fight COVID-19, Roy Wood Jr. gets do-it-yourself haircut tips, and Trevor interviews Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms.
